title: Dartsman
summary: Dartsman - the most intuitive Dart Scoreboard App supports your Dartgame!
description: Oone-Hundred aand eeightyyy!!!!The revolution under the Dart-Scoreboard-Apps!The Dart Scoreboard App counts your scores! (Developed for Steel-Darts)MULTI-SCREEN:Play dart using you Android Wear Device and your Chromecast - or stay classis by using your Smartphone/Tablet!CUSTOMIZABLE:Create your own Layout for Your Chromecast!FAST:Optimized GUI's --> you can focus all alone on your Dart-Match. descriptionHTML:
Oone-Hundred aand eeightyyy!!!!

The revolution under the Dart-Scoreboard-Apps!
The Dart Scoreboard App counts your scores! (Developed for Steel-Darts)

MULTI-SCREEN:
Play dart using you Android Wear Device and your Chromecast - or stay classis by using your Smartphone/Tablet!

CUSTOMIZABLE:
Create your own Layout for Your Chromecast!

FAST:
Optimized GUI's --> you can focus all alone on your Dart-Match.

FLEXIBLE:
Choose between the most popular game-modes: 501 / 301 / Double Finish

Emoji provided free by http://emojione.com
comments: Is it possible to rearrange the sequence of the players? Btw nice app with the Best and most userfriendly ui in the market  Update : it's perfect now ðŸ˜‰

Awesome app!  Finally an use-case for my Chromecast! Even-though I got sausage-fingers, I could easily enter scores from my smartwatch.  I would love to have some motivating Phil Taylor impressions though!
Could be good... But before I delete... Can someone please tell me how to play?
Incorporate more games then just x01 like cricket etc and it would be a 5 star. Only darts scoreboard i have compatible with chromecast.
